###     BootStrap Process for 1000 samples of size = 7
###### *NOTE:* BootStrap Procedure gives proof of the Central Limit Theroem


```{r echo=TRUE}
## Assign Sample to Varible 
x<- c(23, 21 , 39 , 45, 12, 28, 29)
P<- 1000
bootmean <- numeric(P)
###Function executed for 1000 loops 
for (i in 1:P) {
bootsample <- sample(x, size = length(x), replace = TRUE)
bootmean [i] <- mean (bootsample)
}
bootmean
```

### Below Plots provides proof of the Central Limit Theroem, IE values should appear noramlly distributed.  

```{r  echo=TRUE}
hist(bootmean)
qqnorm(bootmean)

```
